name: Yunoia
description:
Yunoia is a UCF, student-led, puzzle-platforming game project.



Summary:

Iris, a light spirit, tends to the color of her world with a prismatic mask. One day, darkness envelops the skies and it begins to vacuum away the colors of her beloved Eden. Set out on a journey together to restore this world by dispersing the iridescence that can be found within.



Features:

Single Player

Immersive Story

5 captivating levels, including tutorial

Unique Mechanics:
  • Grappling
  • Pulsing
  • Cloning

Original Soundtrack



You:

Solve puzzles and navigate this world to bring back the light to it.
